name: Catagory Sales Report
query:
SELECT 
    p.category AS "Category:Link/Category:200",
    SUM(t.quantity) AS "Total Quantity:Int:120",
    SUM(t.price) AS "Total Sales:Currency:150"
FROM 
    `tabTransactions` t
JOIN 
    `tabProduct` p ON t.product = p.name
GROUP BY 
    p.category
ORDER BY 
    SUM(t.price) DESC
